name: Walk the Solar System
description: Quest 2 VR - A not to scale model of the Solar System complete with Asteroid Belt between Mars and Jupiter. On your Left Wrist is a Time Slider control that allows you to speed up, slow down or stop time/Rotation of the Planets. If you place your hand in any of the Planets or Moons you will hear a short description about them. Pick your favorite spot to relax and watch the motion of the spheres. God Bless
